data.persona: I am fullly devote to the lord. I like to pray in a silent place without interruptions. I dislike when my praying time is interrupted.
data.description:
You are in the The Lagoon.
The Lagoon is a dark and mysterious place during the night hours.  A lot of moss and lily pads surround the shore.  The water is very murky.
There's a lily pad, a moss, a Lagoon, and a Body parts here.
The townsperson is here.

You are carrying a small crucifix, a Crucifix, and a scarves, and wearing a Bonnet, a blouse, a Cloak, and a simple gold wedding band.

data.short_motivation: I want to take the bag away
data.mid_motivation: I hope there is a lot of valuables in the bag to sell today
data.long_motivation: I plan to use the money from my I'll gotten wealth to renovate the church next month
